mapper.select: select (total-current) from tour where date = date_format(#{tdate},'%Y-%m-%d')
select id from tour where date= date_format(#{tdate},'%Y-%m-%d')
select date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') as tdate from tour where id=#{tidx}
mapper.update: update tour set current = current + #{tourPeople} where date = date_format(#{tdate},'%Y-%m-%d')
update tour set current = current - #{tourPeople} where date = date_format(#{tdate},'%Y-%m-%d')
update orders set tidx = (select tidx from tour where date = date_format(#{tdate},'%Y-%m-%d')) where id=#{oidx};
